title: Automated ETL Pipeline
challenge: Manual data cleaning was taking 20 hours/week.
insight: Reduced processing time by 90% and eliminated human error in reporting.

title: Executive Sales Dashboard
challenge: Leadership lacked real-time visibility into regional sales performance.
insight: Identified underperforming region, leading to a 15% revenue recovery strategy.

title: Customer Churn Predictor
challenge: Marketing was targeting the wrong user segments for retention.
insight: Pinpointed key churn indicators; model achieved 85% accuracy on test set.

title: Inventory Optimization Tool
challenge: Overstocking led to high storage costs.
insight: Proposed JIT ordering system saving estimated $50k annually.

title: Market Sentiment Analysis
challenge: Need to understand social media reaction to product launch.
insight: Correlated negative sentiment spikes with server downtime incidents.
